dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Damir Seissembekov just announced that smartphone verification might become paid in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Damir Seissembekov just announced that smartphone verification might become paid in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The smartphone verification procedure in Kazakhstan may become paid in the future, head of the Telecommunications Committee at the Ministry of Digital Development, Innovation and Aerospace Industry, Damir Seissembekov, said at a briefing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, really? I thought it was free right now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, really? I thought it was free right now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently, the verification process remains free, but changes could be introduced.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It is, for now. But he mentioned they're keeping it free to make things easier for people during this adaptation period.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is, for now. But he mentioned they're keeping it free to make things easier for people during this adaptation period.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have decided that, for now, there is no need to confirm payment of a fee or provide any additional documents for verification. This is intended to make the process more convenient for citizens and allow for an adaptation period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So when could that change? Did he give any timeline?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So when could that change? Did he give any timeline?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Not exactly, but he did say if it happens, they'll announce it properly. No surprises.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not exactly, but he did say if it happens, they'll announce it properly. No surprises.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: If that happens, we will announce it in due course, Seissembekov said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And what about that June 25 deadline for free verification?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And what about that June twenty five deadline for free verification?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's still on. After that, you can still return an unverified phone even past the usual two-week window.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's still on. After that, you can still return an unverified phone even past the usual two-week window.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, he also noted that the deadline for free smartphone verification for individuals has been extended until June 25. After that date, Kazakhstanis will still be able to return an unverified smartphone to the seller, even if more than two weeks have passed since the purchase.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Huh, so at least there's some flexibility for people who haven't done it yet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huh, so at least there's some flexibility for people who haven't done it yet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. They're trying to balance convenience with whatever comes next.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. They're trying to balance convenience with whatever comes next.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes sense. I wonder how much they might charge if it does go paid.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes sense. I wonder how much they might charge if it does go paid.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: No numbers yet, but knowing how these things go, it'll probably be modestâ€”at least at first.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No numbers yet, but knowing how these things go, it'll probably be modest-at least at first.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, the rules may be revised later, and a paid procedure might be introduced. If that happens, we will announce it in due course, Seissembekov said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and hopefully they keep it accessible. A lot of people rely on their phones for everything now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and hopefully they keep it accessible. A lot of people rely on their phones for everything now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. We'll have to keep an eye on any updates from the Ministry.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. We'll have to keep an eye on any updates from the Ministry.
